channel.title: Luc Souilla
channel.description:
This is my blog where I aim to bridge the gap between scientific findings and the wider community.
Most of the time, you'll find visual explanations, accessible summaries, and articles â€”created both as a reference for my future self and
(hopefully) as a helpful resource for you too.

{{< fa envelope >}} Sign up for my [newsletter](/contact.html#buttondown) to receive updates about new posts.
